responses: Hello! How can I help you today?
Hey! What can I do for you?
We offer web development, mobile app development, and cloud consulting services.

patterns: What is the cost of service X?
How much does your service cost?
responses: Our pricing depends on the service type. Please visit our pricing page for full details.

patterns: How can I reach customer support?
responses: You can reach our support team at support@example.com.
Call our helpline at 1-800-123-4567 for assistance.
